alert.note: Alert for Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...SCATTERED SNOW SHOWERS THIS EVENING... Scattered snow showers are expected this evening for locations along and west of the Allegheny Front. Localized accumulations of a coating to an inch are expected. Gusty northwest winds and very cold temperatures will lead to areas of blowing snow as well. Snow showers and blowing snow may reduce visibility below one mile at time. Please be extra careful when traveling this evening and be prepared for sudden changes in visibility along with the potential for snow covered and slippery surfaces.
